Post: "Having a bad day that got worse because I'm just naturally prone to having terrible luck."

Post: "My photos were corrupted due to a problem between Windows and my SD card, it's because I'm just naturally inept when it comes to technology."

Post: I'm always getting blocked by websites because I'm just from a naturally restricted region."
